Can we start with a little transparency with the person who supposedly did the act?
If you recall Max is a liar. You are the one who confirmed it. You said you never told him that you were divorcing me while you were in Hong Kong.
You said it was a lie. And I sure as hell know, as do you I NEVER beat that kid at 2,3,4 or later in Mexico.
You just don’t get it. You have vilified the fuck out of me. They still don’t have a separation story. How fucked up is that? They just know Mom is
this omnipotent ruler who took Dads wife, kids, friends, and house with his livelihood on the blocks next.
This is so wrong.
